SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry.​Truck.​Current.​Lights
public
SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry.​Truck.​Current.​Lights

Lightlevel and state of Lights

Information
Blinker Avtive

This represents the logical enable state of the blinker. It it is true as long the blinker is enabled regardless of the physical enabled state of the light (i.e. it does not blink and ignores enable state of electric).

Properties
AuxFront
public AuxLevel AuxFront { get; internal set }

Are the auxiliary front lights active?

public AuxLevel AuxRoof { get; internal set }

Are the auxiliary roof lights active?

public float DashboardBacklight { get; internal set }

Intensity of the dashboard backlight as factor <0;1>
